publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5266.2 Ken Macintosh: Learning about Scotland and its Historyâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5266) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, insert at end "and, following concerns expressed by School Leaders Scotland and others over the Curriculum for Excellence, asks ministers to report to the Parliament on the place of history in the developing curriculum."
